fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
fxInfo_question: In this election, were interest groups and individuals able to run paid campaign ads on national broadcast media?

fxInfo_responses.value: It is permitted but regulated in ways that, in practice, favor groups allied with the government.
It is permitted but regulated in ways that, in practice, foster representation of diverse perspectives.

fxInfo_scale: Ordinal, converted to interval by the measurement model
